page.title: 07ORTON-BUILDINGS OF NOTE
page.content: CHURCH OF ST EDITH-Stone church-entry in one of the registers. "St Edith's,Orton,was appropriated to Merevale Abbey by Pope Innocent III (1198-1216)" SHAW CROSS HOUSE-700yrs old{cruck {built}now a Boarding Kennels and cattery. CHURCH FARM-400 yrs old,cruck built now a private home-Complete{thatch.} COACH HOUSES-ORTON HALL-800 yrs old (Hall demolished 1967) COTTAGE ON THE GREEN-300 yrs old, home of Mr.Murray. NATIONAL SCHOOL- built in 1839-"to provide{education}for the poor children of the parish"used as a church hall until purchased in 1971. 2 SEMI-DETACHED-WOODEN-{PREFABRICATED} HOUSES-Scandinavian design-built 1939-40.Many other farms and farm buildings dating back centuries.
